#summary Library dependencies
#labels Featured

PyCSP 0.6.0 has introduced the 4 versions:
  * Threads
  * Processes
  * Greenlets
  * Net


===Threads===
Works with the entire Python 2.x string.

===Processes===
Needs the multiprocessing module available in Python 2.6+

===Greenlets===
Greenlets from Pylib (http://codespeak.net/py/dist/)

===Net===
Python 2.6+
Pyro 3.8+
